column1: Standard-Wall Brass Pipe Nipple Threaded on Both Ends, 1/8 NPT, 2" Long
column11: Connectors for each of the air tanks, one for the main and one for each firing tank.

column1: 304 Stainless Steel Threaded Pipe Fitting Low-Pressure, 90 Degree Adapter, 1/8 NPT Female x Male
column11: Connected to the valves, used to face foward so the air hoses aren't making sharp turns. (For safety basically)

column1: 304 Stainless Steel Threaded Pipe Fitting, Low-Pressure, Tee Connector, 1/8 NPT Female
column11: Connected to the nipple on the main tank, splits the air into 2 valves.

column1: EPDM Rubber Air Hose with 1/8 x 1/8 NPTF Brass Male Fittings, 200 PSI Red 1ft, Red
column11: Hoses that connect from the 90 degree brass fittings to the firing tanks.
Connnected to the Tee Fitting, used to control air flow into the firing tanks.
Connects to the ball valves on firing mechanisms

column1: Brass Body On/Off Valve with T-Handle 1/2 NPT Female
Standard-Wall 304/304L Stainless Steel Pipe Nipple Fully Threaded, 1/8 NPT, 3/4" Long
column11: Connects to the tee connector and valve

column1: 1-1/2" x 1/2" Schedule 40 PVC Reducer Bushing - Spigot x FIPT
column11: Connector to the nipples of the ball valves
Long enough for the 1ft barrels, and the firing air tanks.
Connects to the end of the firing tanks.

column1: Standard-Wall, Reducer, 3 x 2 Female Socket Connect
column11: Connects the firing air tanks to the firing valves

column1: 1/8 NPT Male Center Back Connection, 1-1/2" Dial
column11: For measuring all the PSI of the 3 tanks.

column1: Air Fill Valve, Nickel-Plated Brass, NPT x 3/8" Long Schrader, 200 PSI
column11: For pumping up the main tank.
